stsjorbsmod:DeckOfManyThingsEvent.NAME: Deck of Many Things
DESCRIPTIONS: As you move through ~The~ ~City~ you come across a #pPurple #pMirror. NL You look at it, but you see no reflection.
OPTIONS: [TOUCH THE MIRROR] TOUCH TOUCH TO#C# TOUCH TO UCH TOUCH #rTOUCH TOUCH

DESCRIPTIONS: #g~FOOTSTEPS.~ NL NL A #ythunder of footsteps splash on water and echo off rock. You look around but see no-one in the cavern other than yourself. More and more join as the pacing #pcrescendos into a #b@cacophony.@ NL NL Your head ~swims~ and you fall unconscious. NL NL When you wake you are alone.

#b~REMEMBER.~ NL NL A face comes to you as if in a dream. One that looks like your own, but with fewer lines and scars. NL NL It tells you not to ~forget,~ it tells you to #b~remember.~ #bremember #p~remember~ #p@-member@ #r~-ber~ #r@-ber.@ NL NL You scratch the word into the skin of your arm before you lose it. #yRemember. #yRemember. NL NL As you walk on you notice a dull ache on your forearm, as if it has been scratched.

#r~FEED.~ NL NL The room... accepts you. You stop for a while and feel no pressure to move on. Your #r~hunger~ subsides. If you wished, you could sleep. NL NL It is terrifying. NL NL It is time to move on.
